title: The Little Black Book of Paranormal Passions
description: After teaming up to create The Little Purple Book of Passions, authors Sierra Sofia and T.H. Dillon return with their second series, The Little Black Book of Paranormal Passions. Containing 8 original works of fiction in the adult paranormal romance genre, the reader is given both a male and female perspective on the genre in this one series. Utilizing two completely different writing styles, Sofia and Dillon strive to offer something for everyone.T.H. Dillon offers a tale of a sexy ghost lover in "Ghost Tail", a secret society of dream weavers in "D.W.O.D.", an introduction to a tormented soul in "Hysteria", and the story of a reluctant clairvoyant in "What Haunts Her".Sierra Sofia offers a chronicle of a witch with relationship woes and dark-side infestation in "Toil and Trouble", a cursed wereleopard family in "Endangered", a fairy battling her past and a demon she stumbled upon in "Light and Darkness", and a sassy vampire vigilante with a chip on her shoulder in "No Rites".
author: Thomas Hunter Dillon
